actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that 10 percent of the emergency job funds made available to eligible applicants will be used for jobs in private nonprofit institutions.

summary.text: Provides that 10 per cent of the emergency job funds made available under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to eligible applicants will be used for jobs in private nonprofit institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that 10 percent of the emergency job funds made available to eligible applicants will be used for jobs in private nonprofit institutions.
